Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.rmi

Class RmiConnectionServerController

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.server.rmi.RmiConnectionServerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
RmiConnectionController, Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, Remote
public class RmiConnectionServerController extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RmiConnectionController, Closeable
RMI remotable service implementation which clients can use to establish a connection with the server.

This acts as the entry-point for networking for all clients that want to connect to the server using RMI. Once a connection is established, this will delegate most of the job to the protocol-agnostic ServerController, which will determine whether the player can connect.

See Also:

    • getClientAddressHost

      public String getClientAddressHost()
      Description copied from interface: RmiConnectionController
      Returns the host address of the client invoking this method remotely

      This can be used by clients to discover which address (and therefore which network interface) can successfully communicate with the other party, and therefore bind stuff on that address

      Specified by:
      getClientAddressHost in interface RmiConnectionController
      Returns:

    • doConnect

      public RmiConnectionController.ConnectedController doConnect(String nick, RmiHeartbeatHandler handler) throws RemoteException, NickNotValidException
      Description copied from interface: RmiConnectionController
      Initiates the handshake process with the other party, providing a nickname to be used as an identifier and a means of keeping the connection alive
      Specified by:
      doConnect in interface RmiConnectionController
      Parameters:
      nick - nick to be used as an identifier for this client
      handler - means of keeping the connection alive and detecting potential disconnects
      Returns:
      the remote service exclusive to this player which can be used to join games
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if anything fails and the connection is lost
      NickNotValidException - if the nick is already in use by another player
